divs: Sighting Detailshappened to look out the window.saw a yellow-orange diisk with a red ligth ontop.it semed odd.it overed,slithly moved up,moved a little from left to rigth afew times,went down behind tree line and i saw a blewish glow over the treewhere itwent down.went to bed about an hour,looked out it was back and did theexact same thing.back to bed.my mother inlaw told me that and she is to shy totalk about it.it happened in gaspe Quebec
trends: There have been no other sightings in Saint-Georges-de-Malbaie
This sighting has never been favorited.
